name: B. Suit and Tie
statement:
Allen is hosting a formal dinner party. 2n people come to the event in n
pairs (couples). After a night of fun, Allen wants to line everyone up
for a final picture. The 2n people line up, but Allen doesn’t like the
ordering. Allen prefers if each pair occupies adjacent positions in the
line, as this makes the picture more aesthetic.Help Allen find the
minimum number of swaps of positions he must perform to make it so that
each couple occupies adjacent positions in the line.
